title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1801.4 - Condemnation proceeding
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1801.4 - Condemnation proceeding

State Regulations

Where financial assistance is to be made available or for
which an application therefor has been made, the following shall be submitted
to the commissioner simultaneously with an application to the court for
condemnation of property: (a) A
property map showing parcels to be condemned. (b) The resolution authorizing condemnation
proceedings. (c) An opinion of
agency counsel stating that all requirements of State and local law and Title I
of the Housing Act of 1949, as amended and supplemented, have been
met. (d) A copy of the petition to
the court for the condemnation. (e) If the petition does not contain a request for an order of immediate possession
and/or vesting of title, an explanation of the reasons therefor. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1801.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
